>> service-a/config.yaml
name: service-a
settings:
  debug: true
  log_level: verbose
auto_settings:
  debug: true
  log_level: verbose
replicas: 5
maxReplicas: 5
timeout: 30

>> service-b/config.yaml
name: service-b
settings:
  debug: false
auto_settings:
  debug: false
replicas: 10
maxReplicas: 15
timeout: 60
